contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 2016 D SCABA Entertainment Contest (A Section)
SCABA Entertainment Contest (A Section) 10 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark SCABA Entertainment Contest scaba-entertainment-contest-a-section
Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex for scaba graded First and Championship section bands. Marks awarded for Musical performance (60), Entertainment Value (30) and Presentation & Deportment (10).
Best Soloist: Amelia Young, flugel, Otterbourne Best March: Otterbourne
May 5, 2016, 11:05 a.m. May 23, 2016, 8:22 a.m.
1 Verwood Concert Brass Kevin Smith
2 Otterbourne Brass Melvin White
Withdrawn Yiewsley and West Drayton Band Chris Cole
Withdrawn Sandhurst Silver Andrew Porter
